gpcm.sample module¶

class gpcm.sample.ESS(log_lik, sample_prior, x_init=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Elliptical slice sampling algorithm.

Parameters

  • log_lik (function) – Function that returns the log value of a quantity that is proportional to the likelihood of the target distribution.

  • sample_prior (function) – Function that generates a sample from the prior of the target distribution. The prior must be a zero mean Gaussian.

move(x)[source]¶

Move to a particular state.

Parameters

x (tensor) – State to move to.

sample(num=1, trace=False)[source]¶

Generate samples from the target distribution.

Parameters

  • num (int, optional) – Number of samples. Defaults to one.

  • trace (bool, optional) – Show progress. Defaults to False.

Returns

Samples.

Return type

list[tensor]
